member.name: ID2D1EffectContext.CheckFeatureSupport
member.summary: This indicates whether an optional capability is supported by the D3D device.
member.param: The feature to query support for.
A structure indicating information about how or if the feature is supported.
The size of the featureSupportData parameter.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: Direct2D could not allocate sufficient memory to complete the call.
An invalid parameter was passed to the returning function.

member.name: ID2D1EffectContext.CreateBlendTransform
member.summary: This creates a blend transform that can be inserted into a transform graph.
member.param: The number of inputs to the blend transform.
Describes the blend transform that is to be created.
The returned blend transform.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: Direct2D could not allocate sufficient memory to complete the call.
An invalid parameter was passed to the returning function.

member.name: ID2D1EffectContext.CreateBorderTransform
member.summary: Creates a transform that extends its input infinitely in every direction based on the passed in extend mode.
member.param: The extend mode in the X-axis direction.
The extend mode in the Y-axis direction.
The returned transform.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: Direct2D could not allocate sufficient memory to complete the call.
An invalid parameter was passed to the returning function.

member.name: ID2D1EffectContext.CreateBoundsAdjustmentTransform
member.summary: Creates and returns a bounds adjustment transform.
member.param: The initial output rectangle for the bounds adjustment transform.
The returned bounds adjustment transform.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: Direct2D could not allocate sufficient memory to complete the call.
An invalid parameter was passed to the returning function.

member.name: ID2D1EffectContext.CreateColorContext

summary.para: Creates a color context from a color space.
If the color space is Custom, the context is initialized from the profile and profileSize parameters.
If the color space is not Custom, the context is initialized with the profile bytes associated with the color space. The profile and profileSize parameters are ignored.

member.param: The space of color context to create.
A buffer containing the ICC profile bytes used to initialize the color context when space is . For other types, the parameter is ignored and should be set to NULL.
The size in bytes of Profile.
When this method returns, contains the address of a pointer to a new color context object.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: Direct2D could not allocate sufficient memory to complete the call.
An invalid value was passed to the method.

member.name: ID2D1EffectContext.CreateColorContextFromFilename
member.summary: Creates a color context by loading it from the specified filename. The profile bytes are the contents of the file specified by filename.
member.param: The path to the file containing the profile bytes to initialize the color context with.
When this method returns, contains the address of a pointer to a new color context.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: Direct2D could not allocate sufficient memory to complete the call.
An invalid value was passed to the method.

member.name: ID2D1EffectContext.CreateColorContextFromWicColorContext
member.summary: Creates a color context from an . The space of the resulting context varies, see Remarks for more info.
member.param: The used to initialize the color context.
When this method returns, contains the address of a pointer to a new color context.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: Direct2D could not allocate sufficient memory to complete the call.
An invalid value was passed to the method.

member.name: ID2D1EffectContext.CreateEffect
member.summary: Creates a Direct2D effect for the specified class ID. This is the same as so custom effects can create other effects and wrap them in a transform.
member.param: The built-in or registered effect ID to create the effect. See Built-in Effects for a list of effect IDs.
When this method returns, contains the address of a pointer to the effect.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: Direct2D could not allocate sufficient memory to complete the call.
An invalid value was passed to the method.
Direct3D does not have enough display memory to perform the operation.
The specified effect is not registered by the system.

member.name: ID2D1EffectContext.CreateOffsetTransform
member.summary: Creates and returns an offset transform.
member.param: The offset amount.
When this method returns, contains the address of a pointer to an offset transform object.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: Direct2D could not allocate sufficient memory to complete the call.
An invalid parameter was passed to the returning function.

member.name: ID2D1EffectContext.CreateResourceTexture
member.summary: Creates or finds the given resource texture, depending on whether a resource id is specified. It also optionally initializes the texture with the specified data.
member.param: An optional pointer to the unique id that identifies the lookup table.
The properties used to create the resource texture.
The optional data to be loaded into the resource texture.
An optional pointer to the stride to advance through the resource texture, according to dimension.
The size, in bytes, of the data.
The returned texture that can be used as a resource in a Direct2D effect.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: Direct2D could not allocate sufficient memory to complete the call.
An invalid parameter was passed to the returning function.

member.name: ID2D1EffectContext.CreateTransformNodeFromEffect
member.summary: Wraps an effect graph into a single transform node and then inserted into a transform graph. This allows an effect to aggregate other effects. This will typically be done in order to allow the effect properties to be re-expressed with a different contract, or to allow different components to integrate each-other’s effects.
member.param: The effect to be wrapped in a transform node.
The returned transform node that encapsulates the effect graph.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: Direct2D could not allocate sufficient memory to complete the call.
An invalid parameter was passed to the returning function.

member.name: ID2D1EffectContext.CreateVertexBuffer
member.summary: Creates a vertex buffer or finds a standard vertex buffer and optionally initializes it with vertices. The returned buffer can be specified in the render info to specify both a vertex shader and or to pass custom vertices to the standard vertex shader used by Direct2D.
member.param: The properties used to describe the vertex buffer and vertex shader.
The unique id that identifies the vertex buffer.
The properties used to define a custom vertex buffer. If you use a built-in vertex shader, you don't have to specify this property.
The returned vertex buffer.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: Direct2D could not allocate sufficient memory to complete the call.
An invalid parameter was passed to the returning function.

member.name: ID2D1EffectContext.FindResourceTexture
member.summary: Finds the given resource texture if it has already been created with with the same GUID.
member.param: The unique id that identifies the resource texture.
The returned texture that can be used as a resource in a Direct2D effect.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: The requested resource texture was not found.

member.name: ID2D1EffectContext.FindVertexBuffer
member.summary: This finds the given vertex buffer if it has already been created with with the same GUID.
member.param: The unique id that identifies the vertex buffer.
The returned vertex buffer that can be used as a resource in a Direct2D effect.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: The requested vertex buffer was not found.

member.name: ID2D1EffectContext.GetDpi
member.summary: Gets the unit mapping that an effect will use for properties that could be in either dots per inch (dpi) or pixels.
member.param: The dpi on the x-axis.
The dpi on the y-axis.

member.name: ID2D1EffectContext.GetMaximumSupportedFeatureLevel
member.summary: This indicates the maximum feature level from the provided list which is supported by the device. If none of the provided levels are supported, then this API fails with D2DERR_INSUFFICIENT_DEVICE_CAPABILITIES.
member.param: The feature levels provided by the application.
The count of feature levels provided by the application
The maximum feature level from the featureLevels list which is supported by the D2D device.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: Direct2D could not allocate sufficient memory to complete the call.
An invalid parameter was passed to the returning function.
None of the provided levels are supported.

member.name: ID2D1EffectContext.IsBufferPrecisionSupported
member.summary: Indicates whether the buffer precision is supported by the underlying Direct2D
member.param: The buffer precision to check.
member.returns: Returns TRUE if the buffer precision is supported. Returns FALSE if the buffer precision is not supported.

member.name: ID2D1EffectContext.IsShaderLoaded
member.summary: This tests to see if the given shader is loaded.
member.param: The unique id that identifies the shader.

member.name: ID2D1EffectContext.LoadComputeShader
member.summary: Loads the given shader by its unique ID. Loading the shader multiple times is ignored. When the shader is loaded it is also handed to the driver to JIT, if it hasn’t been already.
member.param: The unique id that identifies the shader.
The buffer that contains the shader to register.
The size of the shader buffer in bytes.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: Direct2D could not allocate sufficient memory to complete the call.
An invalid parameter was passed to the returning function.

member.name: ID2D1EffectContext
member.summary: Provides factory methods and other state management for effect and transform authors.
